name: Fishing Game Proof of Concept
description:
Controls: WASD - Move, E-Cast, Reel In.

If a fish gets close enough to the bobber, it will bite. If the Tension meter fills, the line breaks, and the fish gets away.

I currently have too much free time, so I decided to put together a little fishing game! I put this together to try out a few things and I figured I would put it up here for others to see!! I'm not sure if I want to do anything more with it, but I have some ideas for things that I could add. If you have any comments or issues, contact me on Twitter: @madlobotanist.
